data.name: Paws and Leaves - A Thracian Tale
data.detailed_description:
Experience our short 1-hour long Prologue "Roots of Me" in Spring 2023!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1927470/


Our Crowdfunding will start soon via Kickstarter

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/grownarts/paws-and-leaves-a-thracian-tale


About the Game

Paws and Leaves – A Thracian Tale is a 3rd person story-driven game in which you will be experiencing the journey of the cutest fox of foxes. His name is Me. You will be confronted with the beautiful and joyful, but also with sorrowful and sad moments in the life of the fox.

This is the story of a young fox’s premature death. While discovering a forest, you will learn how to interact with the world step by step and start to see it in new playful ways, while you help Me to remember his senses. You will need the help of time and seasons to find pieces of your memory that lead your way through this very touching journey.

data.short_description: While discovering seasons of a forest, memories will recover the senses of Me, a fox, to fullfil his destiny in a touching story beyond life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti 1GB/ Radeon 6950 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 4GB / Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
